page.title: 05FA'SIDE CASTLE
page.content: FA'SIDE CASTLE IS ONE OF OUR FAVOURITE PLACES.WE GO MAINLY ON FRIDAYS AND SOMETIMES AT THE WEEK ENDS. WHEN WE GO UP THERE FA'SIDE LOOKS NICE IN THE INSIDE BECAUSE IT IS BEING REBUILT. WHEN YOU GO INSIDE IT A MAN WILL SHOW YOU ALL AROUND IT.HE TOLD US THAT HE HAD FOUND AN OLD PAIR OF LEATHER SHOES AND SOME CANNON BALLS, INSIDE THE CASTLE BEFORE IT WAS REBUILT.IT HAS STONE WALLS IT HAS SIX ROOMS IN IT, A DINING ROOM, A TOILET, A KITCHEN AND A DRAWING ROOM .OUT SIDE IT HAS A GOOD VIEW AND IT HAS BEAUTIFUL WINDOWS. THE CASTLE IS PAINTED CREAM AND HAS TURRETS. IT LOOKS LIKE A FAIRY TALE CASTLE. MARY QUEEN OF SCOTS CAME TO STAY THERE FOR A FEW DAYS.
